name: Smash'd
description:
This is a puzzle-platformer where you are a man who has been abducted by aliens and is trying to escape their test facility. Unfortunately, this does not go unnoticed by your captors, and they send out guards and a gargantuan spiky crusher to stop you! Can you make it through all 12 levels?

Arrow keys or WASD to move, and N to skip a level.

Windows only, sorry :)
